00020 #define MORALE_MOD_MAX 50           // morale *mod* range is -50 to 50, if you change this, check the decay formulas!
00021 
00022 #define     DRUG_EFFECT_MORALE_MOD              150
00023 #define     ALCOHOL_EFFECT_MORALE_MOD           160
00024 
00025 #define HOURS_BETWEEN_STRATEGIC_DECAY 3
00026 
00027 #define PHOBIC_LIMIT -20

00031 #define SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR( pSoldier, sX, sY, bZ )           ( !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors && ( pSoldier->sSectorX == sX ) && ( pSoldier->sSectorY == sY ) && ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == bZ ) )

00035 MoraleEvent gbMoraleEvent[NUM_MORALE_EVENTS] =
00036 {
00037       // TACTICAL = Short Term Effect, STRATEGIC = Long Term Effect
00038       {     TACTICAL_MORALE_EVENT,              +4},  //    MORALE_KILLED_ENEMY
00039       { TACTICAL_MORALE_EVENT,              -5},      //    MORALE_SQUADMATE_DIED,        // in same sector (not really squad)... IN ADDITION to strategic loss of morale
00040       { TACTICAL_MORALE_EVENT,                  -1},  //    MORALE_SUPPRESSED,                        // up to 4 times per turn
00041       { TACTICAL_MORALE_EVENT,                  -2},  //    MORALE_AIRSTRIKE,
00042       { TACTICAL_MORALE_EVENT,                  +2},  //    MORALE_DID_LOTS_OF_DAMAGE,

00077 
00078 INT8 GetMoraleModifier( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00079 {
00080       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
00081       {
00082             if (pSoldier->bMorale > 50)
00083             {
00084                   // give +1 at 55, +3 at 65, up to +5 at 95 and above
00085                   return( (pSoldier->bMorale - 45) / 10 );
00086             }
00087             else
00088             {
00089                   // give penalties down to -20 at 0 (-2 at 45, -4 by 40...)
00090                   return( (pSoldier->bMorale - 50) * 2 / 5 );
00091             }
00092       }
00093       else
00094       {
00095             // use AI morale
00096             switch( pSoldier->bAIMorale )
00097             {
00098                   case MORALE_HOPELESS:
00099                         return( -15 );
00100                   case MORALE_WORRIED:
00101                         return( -7 );
00102                   case MORALE_CONFIDENT:
00103                         return( 2 );
00104                   case MORALE_FEARLESS:
00105                         return( 5 );
00106                   default:
00107                         return( 0 );
00108             }
00109 
00110       }
00111 }
00112 
00113 void DecayTacticalMorale( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00114 {
00115       // decay the tactical morale modifier
00116       if (pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod != 0)
00117       {
00118             // decay the modifier!
00119             if (pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod > 0)
00120             {
00121                   pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod = __max( 0, pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod - (8 - pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod / 10) );
00122             }
00123             else
00124             {
00125                   pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod = __min( 0, pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod + (6 + pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod / 10) );
00126             }
00127       }
00128 }
00129 
00130 void DecayStrategicMorale( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00131 {
00132       // decay the modifier!
00133       if (pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod > 0)
00134       {
00135             pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod = __max( 0, pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod - (8 - pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod / 10) );
00136       }
00137       else
00138       {
00139             pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod = __min( 0, pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod + (6 + pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod / 10) );
00140       }
00141 }
00142 
00143 void DecayTacticalMoraleModifiers( void )
00144 {
00145       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00146       UINT8                         ubLoop, ubLoop2;
00147       BOOLEAN                       fHandleNervous;
00148 
00149       ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00150       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pSoldier++ )
00151       {     
00152             //if the merc is active, in Arulco
00153             // CJC: decay modifiers while asleep! or POW!
00154             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && 
00155                                                                                           !(pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ||
00156                                                                                                       pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
00157             {
00158                   // only let morale mod decay if it is positive while merc is a POW
00159                   if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW && pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod < 0 )
00160                   {
00161                         continue;
00162                   }
00163 
00164                   switch( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait )
00165                   {
00166                         case CLAUSTROPHOBIC:
00167                               if ( pSoldier->bSectorZ > 0 )
00168                               {                                   
00169                                     // underground, no recovery... in fact, if tact morale is high, decay
00170                                     if ( pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod > PHOBIC_LIMIT )
00171                                     {
00172                                           HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_CLAUSTROPHOBE_UNDERGROUND, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00173                                     }
00174                                     continue;
00175                               }
00176                               break;
00177                         case NERVOUS:
00178                               if ( pSoldier->bMorale < 50 )
00179                               {
00180                                     if (pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 && PlayerIDGroupInMotion( pSoldier->ubGroupID ))
00181                                     {
00182                                           if ( NumberOfPeopleInSquad( pSoldier->bAssignment ) == 1 )
00183                                           {
00184                                                 fHandleNervous = TRUE;
00185                                           }
00186                                           else
00187                                           {
00188                                                 fHandleNervous = FALSE;
00189                                           }
00190                                     }
00191                                     else if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
00192                                     {
00193                                           if ( DistanceToClosestFriend( pSoldier ) > NERVOUS_RADIUS )
00194                                           {
00195                                                 fHandleNervous = TRUE;
00196                                           }
00197                                           else
00198                                           {
00199                                                 fHandleNervous = FALSE;
00200                                           }
00201                                     }
00202                                     else 
00203                                     {
00204                                           // look for anyone else in same sector
00205                                           fHandleNervous = TRUE;
00206                                           for ( ubLoop2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; ubLoop2 <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop2++ )
00207                                           {
00208                                                 if ( MercPtrs[ ubLoop2 ] != pSoldier && MercPtrs[ ubLoop2 ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ ubLoop2 ]->sSectorX == pSoldier->sSectorX && MercPtrs[ ubLoop2 ]->sSectorY == pSoldier->sSectorY && MercPtrs[ ubLoop2 ]->bSectorZ == pSoldier->bSectorZ )
00209                                                 {
00210                                                       // found someone!
00211                                                       fHandleNervous = FALSE;
00212                                                       break;
00213                                                 }
00214                                           }                                                                                   
00215                                     }
00216 
00217                                     if ( fHandleNervous )
00218                                     {
00219                                           if ( pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod == PHOBIC_LIMIT )
00220                                           {
00221                                                 // don't change morale
00222                                                 continue;
00223                                           }
00224 
00225                                           // alone, no recovery... in fact, if tact morale is high, decay
00226                                           if ( !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY) )
00227                                           {
00228                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_TRAIT );
00229                                                 pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY;
00230                                           }
00231                                           HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_NERVOUS_ALONE, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00232                                           continue;
00233                                     }
00234                               }
00235                   }
00236 
00237                   DecayTacticalMorale( pSoldier );
00238                   RefreshSoldierMorale( pSoldier );
00239             }
00240       }
00241 }
00242 
00243 void DecayStrategicMoraleModifiers( void )
00244 {
00245       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00246       UINT8                         ubLoop;
00247 
00248       ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00249       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pSoldier++ )
00250       {     
00251             //if the merc is active, in Arulco
00252             // CJC: decay modifiers while asleep! or POW!
00253             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && 
00254                                                                                           !(pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ||
00255                                                                                                 pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
00256             {
00257                   // only let morale mod decay if it is positive while merc is a POW
00258                   if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW && pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod < 0 )
00259                   {
00260                         continue;
00261                   }
00262 
00263                   DecayStrategicMorale( pSoldier );
00264                   RefreshSoldierMorale( pSoldier );
00265             }
00266       }
00267 }

00270 
00271 void RefreshSoldierMorale( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00272 {
00273       INT32       iActualMorale;
00274 
00275       if ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
00276       {
00277             // delay this till later!
00278             return;
00279       }
00280 
00281       // CJC, April 19, 1999: added up to 20% morale boost according to progress
00282       iActualMorale = DEFAULT_MORALE + (INT32) pSoldier->bTeamMoraleMod + (INT32) pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod + (INT32) pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod + (INT32) (CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage() / 5);
00283 
00284       // ATE: Modify morale based on drugs....
00285       iActualMorale  += ( ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] * DRUG_EFFECT_MORALE_MOD ) / 100 );
00286       iActualMorale  += ( ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL ] * ALCOHOL_EFFECT_MORALE_MOD ) / 100 );
00287 
00288       iActualMorale = __min( 100, iActualMorale );
00289       iActualMorale = __max( 0, iActualMorale );
00290       pSoldier->bMorale = (INT8) iActualMorale;
00291 
00292       // update mapscreen as needed
00293       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE; 
00294 }
00295 
00296 
00297 void UpdateSoldierMorale( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 ubType, INT8 bMoraleMod )
00298 {
00299       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pProfile;
00300       INT32                                                 iMoraleModTotal;
00301 
00302       if ( !pSoldier->bActive || ( pSoldier->bLife < CONSCIOUSNESS ) ||
00303              ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) || AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
00304       {
00305             return;
00306       }
00307 
00308       if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) ||
00309                    ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ||
00310                    ( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) )
00311       {
00312             return;
00313       }
00314 
00315 
00316       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE )
00317       {
00318             return;
00319       }
00320 
00321       pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ]);
00322 
00323       if (bMoraleMod > 0)
00324       {
00325             switch( pProfile->bAttitude )
00326             {
00327                   case ATT_OPTIMIST:
00328                   case ATT_AGGRESSIVE:
00329                         bMoraleMod += 1;
00330                         break;
00331                   case ATT_PESSIMIST:
00332                         bMoraleMod -= 1;
00333                         break;
00334                   default:
00335                         break;
00336             }
00337             if (bMoraleMod < 0)
00338             {
00339                   // can't change a positive event into a negative one!
00340                   bMoraleMod = 0;
00341             }
00342       }
00343       else
00344       {
00345             switch( pProfile->bAttitude )
00346             {
00347                   case ATT_OPTIMIST:
00348                         bMoraleMod += 1;
00349                         break;
00350                   case ATT_PESSIMIST:
00351                         bMoraleMod -= 1;
00352                         break;
00353                   case ATT_COWARD:
00354                         bMoraleMod -= 2;
00355                   default:
00356                         break;
00357             }
00358             if (pSoldier->bLevel == 1)
00359             {
00360                   bMoraleMod--;
00361             }
00362             else if (pSoldier->bLevel > 5)
00363             {
00364                   bMoraleMod++;
00365             }
00366             if (bMoraleMod > 0)
00367             {
00368                   // can't change a negative event into a positive one!
00369                   bMoraleMod = 0;
00370             }
00371       }
00372       // apply change!
00373       if (ubType == TACTICAL_MORALE_EVENT)
00374       {
00375             iMoraleModTotal = (INT32) pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod + (INT32) bMoraleMod;
00376             iMoraleModTotal = __min( iMoraleModTotal, MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00377             iMoraleModTotal = __max( iMoraleModTotal, -MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00378             pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod = (INT8) iMoraleModTotal;
00379       }
00380       else if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector && !pSoldier->bInSector ) // delayed strategic
00381       {
00382             iMoraleModTotal = (INT32) pSoldier->bDelayedStrategicMoraleMod + (INT32) bMoraleMod;
00383             iMoraleModTotal = __min( iMoraleModTotal, MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00384             iMoraleModTotal = __max( iMoraleModTotal, -MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00385             pSoldier->bDelayedStrategicMoraleMod = (INT8) iMoraleModTotal;
00386       }
00387       else // strategic
00388       {           
00389             iMoraleModTotal = (INT32) pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod + (INT32) bMoraleMod;
00390             iMoraleModTotal = __min( iMoraleModTotal, MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00391             iMoraleModTotal = __max( iMoraleModTotal, -MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00392             pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod = (INT8) iMoraleModTotal;
00393       }
00394 
00395       RefreshSoldierMorale( pSoldier );
00396 
00397       if ( !pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
00398       {
00399             if ( !gfSomeoneSaidMoraleQuote )
00400             {
00401                   // Check if we're below a certain value and warn
00402                   if ( pSoldier->bMorale < 35 )
00403                   {
00404                         // Have we said this quote yet?
00405                         if ( !(     pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_LOW_MORAL ) )
00406                         {
00407                               gfSomeoneSaidMoraleQuote = TRUE;
00408 
00409                               // ATE: Amde it a DELAYED QUOTE - will be delayed by the dialogue Q until it's our turn...
00410                               DelayedTacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_STARTING_TO_WHINE );              
00411                               pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_LOW_MORAL;
00412                         }
00413                   }
00414             }
00415       }
00416 
00417       // Reset flag!
00418       if ( pSoldier->bMorale > 65 )
00419       {
00420             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_LOW_MORAL );
00421       }
00422 
00423 }
00424 
00425 
00426 void HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bMoraleEvent )
00427 {
00428       UpdateSoldierMorale( pSoldier, gbMoraleEvent[bMoraleEvent].ubType, gbMoraleEvent[bMoraleEvent].bChange );
00429 }
00430 
00431 
00432 void HandleMoraleEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bMoraleEvent, INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
00433 {
00434       UINT8                                                 ubLoop;
00435       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pTeamSoldier;
00436       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pProfile;
00437 
00438       gfSomeoneSaidMoraleQuote = FALSE;
00439 
00440       // NOTE: Many morale events are NOT attached to a specific player soldier at all!
00441       // Those that do need it have Asserts on a case by case basis below
00442       if (pSoldier == NULL)
00443       {
00444             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Handling morale event %d at X=%d, Y=%d,Z=%d", bMoraleEvent, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) );
00445       }
00446       else
00447       {
00448             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Handling morale event %d for %S at X=%d, Y=%d, Z=%d", bMoraleEvent, pSoldier->name, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) );
00449       }
00450 
00451 
00452       switch( bMoraleEvent )
00453       {
00454             case MORALE_KILLED_ENEMY:
00455             case MORALE_DID_LOTS_OF_DAMAGE:
00456             case MORALE_DRUGS_CRASH:
00457             case MORALE_ALCOHOL_CRASH:
00458             case MORALE_SUPPRESSED:
00459             case MORALE_TOOK_LOTS_OF_DAMAGE:
00460             case MORALE_HIGH_DEATHRATE:
00461             case MORALE_SEX:
00462                   // needs specific soldier!
00463                   Assert( pSoldier );
00464                   // affects the soldier only
00465                   HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pSoldier, bMoraleEvent );
00466                   break;
00467 
00468             case MORALE_CLAUSTROPHOBE_UNDERGROUND:
00469             case MORALE_INSECT_PHOBIC_SEES_CREATURE:
00470             case MORALE_NERVOUS_ALONE:
00471                   // needs specific soldier!
00472                   Assert( pSoldier );
00473                   // affects the soldier only, should be ignored if tactical morale mod is -20 or less
00474                   if ( pSoldier->bTacticalMoraleMod > PHOBIC_LIMIT )
00475                   {
00476                         HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pSoldier, bMoraleEvent );
00477                   }
00478                   break;
00479 
00480             case MORALE_BATTLE_WON:
00481                   // affects everyone to varying degrees
00482                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00483                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
00484                   {
00485                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
00486                         {
00487                               if ( SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR( pTeamSoldier, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) )
00488                               {
00489                                     HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_BATTLE_WON );
00490                               }
00491                               else
00492                               {
00493                                     HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_WON );
00494                               }
00495                         }
00496                   }
00497                   break;
00498             case MORALE_RAN_AWAY:
00499                   // affects everyone to varying degrees
00500                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00501                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
00502                   {
00503                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
00504                         {
00505                               // CJC: adding to SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR check special stuff because the old sector values might
00506                               // be appropriate (because in transit going out of that sector!)
00507 
00508                               if ( SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR( pTeamSoldier, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) || ( pTeamSoldier->fBetweenSectors && ((pTeamSoldier->ubPrevSectorID % 16) + 1) == sMapX && ((pTeamSoldier->ubPrevSectorID / 16) + 1) == sMapY && ( pTeamSoldier->bSectorZ == bMapZ ) ) )
00509                               {
00510                                     switch ( gMercProfiles[ pTeamSoldier->ubProfile ].bAttitude )
00511                                     {
00512                                           case ATT_AGGRESSIVE:
00513                                                 // double the penalty - these guys REALLY hate running away
00514                                                 HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_RAN_AWAY );
00515                                                 HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_RAN_AWAY );
00516                                                 break;
00517                                           case ATT_COWARD:
00518                                                 // no penalty - cowards are perfectly happy to avoid fights!
00519                                                 break;
00520                                           default:
00521                                                 HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_RAN_AWAY );
00522                                                 break;
00523                                     }
00524                               }
00525                               else
00526                               {
00527                                     HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_LOST );
00528                               }
00529                         }
00530                   }
00531                   break;
00532 
00533             case MORALE_TOWN_LIBERATED:
00534             case MORALE_TOWN_LOST:
00535             case MORALE_MINE_LIBERATED:
00536             case MORALE_MINE_LOST:
00537             case MORALE_SAM_SITE_LIBERATED:
00538             case MORALE_SAM_SITE_LOST:
00539             case MORALE_KILLED_CIVILIAN:
00540             case MORALE_LOW_DEATHRATE:
00541             case MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_WON:
00542             case MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_LOST:
00543             case MORALE_MONSTER_QUEEN_KILLED:
00544             case MORALE_DEIDRANNA_KILLED:
00545                   // affects everyone, everywhere
00546                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00547                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
00548                   {
00549                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
00550                         {
00551                               HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, bMoraleEvent );
00552                         }
00553                   }
00554                   break;
00555 
00556             case MORALE_POOR_MORALE:
00557             case MORALE_GREAT_MORALE:
00558             case MORALE_AIRSTRIKE:
00559                   // affects every in sector
00560                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00561                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
00562                   {
00563                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR( pTeamSoldier, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) )
00564                         {
00565                               HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, bMoraleEvent );
00566                         }
00567                   }
00568                   break;
00569 
00570             case MORALE_MERC_CAPTURED:
00571                   // needs specific soldier! (for reputation, not here)
00572                   Assert( pSoldier );
00573 
00574                   // affects everyone
00575                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00576                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
00577                   {
00578                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
00579                         {
00580                               HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, bMoraleEvent );
00581                         }
00582                   }
00583                   break;
00584             case MORALE_TEAMMATE_DIED:
00585                   // needs specific soldier!
00586                   Assert( pSoldier );
00587 
00588                   // affects everyone, in sector differently than not, extra bonuses if it's a buddy or hated merc
00589                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00590                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
00591                   {
00592                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE)
00593                         {                       
00594                               pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ pTeamSoldier->ubProfile ]);
00595 
00596                               if (HATED_MERC( pProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile ))
00597                               {
00598                                     // yesss!
00599                                     HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_HATED_DIED );
00600                               }
00601                               else
00602                               {
00603                                     if ( SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR( pTeamSoldier, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) )
00604                                     {
00605                                           // mate died in my sector!  tactical morale mod
00606                                           HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_SQUADMATE_DIED );
00607                                     }
00608 
00609                                     // this is handled for everyone even if in sector, as it's a strategic morale mod
00610                                     HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_TEAMMATE_DIED );
00611 
00612                                     if (BUDDY_MERC( pProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile ))
00613                                     {
00614                                           // oh no!  buddy died!
00615                                           HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_BUDDY_DIED );
00616                                     }
00617                               }
00618                         }
00619                   }
00620                   break;
00621 
00622             case MORALE_MERC_MARRIED:
00623                   // female mercs get unhappy based on how sexist they are (=hate men)
00624                   // gentlemen males get unhappy too
00625                   
00626                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00627                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
00628                   {
00629                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00630                         {
00631                               if ( WhichHated( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile ) != -1 )
00632                               {
00633                                     // we hate 'em anyways
00634                                     continue;
00635                               }
00636 
00637                               if ( gMercProfiles[ pTeamSoldier->ubProfile ].bSex == FEMALE )
00638                               {
00639                                     switch( gMercProfiles[ pTeamSoldier->ubProfile ].bSexist )
00640                                     {
00641                                           case SOMEWHAT_SEXIST:
00642                                                 HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_MERC_MARRIED );
00643                                                 break;
00644                                           case VERY_SEXIST:
00645                                                 // handle TWICE!
00646                                                 HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_MERC_MARRIED );
00647                                                 HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_MERC_MARRIED );
00648                                                 break;
00649                                           default:
00650                                                 break;
00651                                     }
00652                               }
00653                               else
00654                               {
00655                                     switch( gMercProfiles[ pTeamSoldier->ubProfile ].bSexist )
00656                                     {
00657                                           case GENTLEMAN:
00658                                                 HandleMoraleEventForSoldier( pTeamSoldier, MORALE_MERC_MARRIED );
00659                                                 break;
00660                                           default:
00661                                                 break;
00662                                     }
00663                               }
00664                               
00665                         }
00666                   }                 
00667                   break;
00668 
00669             default:
00670                   // debug message
00671                   ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Invalid morale event type = %d.  AM/CC-1", bMoraleEvent );
00672                   break;
00673       }
00674 
00675 
00676       // some morale events also impact the player's reputation with the mercs back home
00677       switch( bMoraleEvent )
00678       {
00679             case MORALE_HIGH_DEATHRATE:
00680                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_HIGH_DEATHRATE);
00681                   break;
00682             case MORALE_LOW_DEATHRATE:
00683                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_LOW_DEATHRATE);
00684                   break;
00685             case MORALE_POOR_MORALE:
00686                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_POOR_MORALE);
00687                   break;
00688             case MORALE_GREAT_MORALE:
00689                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_GREAT_MORALE);
00690                   break;
00691             case MORALE_BATTLE_WON:
00692                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_BATTLE_WON);
00693                   break;
00694             case MORALE_RAN_AWAY:
00695             case MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_LOST:
00696                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_BATTLE_LOST);
00697                   break;
00698             case MORALE_TOWN_LIBERATED:
00699                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_TOWN_WON);
00700                   break;
00701             case MORALE_TOWN_LOST:
00702                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_TOWN_LOST);
00703                   break;
00704             case MORALE_TEAMMATE_DIED:
00705                   // impact depends on that dude's level of experience
00706                   ModifyPlayerReputation((UINT8) (pSoldier->bExpLevel * REPUTATION_SOLDIER_DIED));
00707                   break;
00708             case MORALE_MERC_CAPTURED:
00709                   // impact depends on that dude's level of experience
00710                   ModifyPlayerReputation((UINT8) (pSoldier->bExpLevel * REPUTATION_SOLDIER_CAPTURED));
00711                   break;
00712             case MORALE_KILLED_CIVILIAN:
00713                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_KILLED_CIVILIAN);
00714                   break;
00715             case MORALE_MONSTER_QUEEN_KILLED:
00716                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_KILLED_MONSTER_QUEEN);
00717                   break;
00718             case MORALE_DEIDRANNA_KILLED:
00719                   ModifyPlayerReputation(REPUTATION_KILLED_DEIDRANNA);
00720                   break;
00721 
00722             default:
00723                   // no reputation impact
00724                   break;
00725       }
00726 }
00727 
00728 
00729 void HourlyMoraleUpdate( void )
00730 {
00731       INT8                                                  bMercID, bOtherID;
00732       INT8                                                  bActualTeamOpinion;
00733       INT8                                                  bTeamMoraleModChange, bTeamMoraleModDiff;
00734       INT8                                                  bOpinion=-1;
00735       INT32                                                 iTotalOpinions;
00736       INT8                                                  bNumTeamMembers;
00737       INT8                                                  bHighestTeamLeadership = 0;
00738       INT8                                                  bLastTeamID;
00739       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pSoldier;
00740       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pOtherSoldier;
00741       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pProfile;
00742       BOOLEAN                                               fSameGroupOnly;
00743       static INT8                               bStrategicMoraleUpdateCounter = 0;
00744       BOOLEAN                                               fFoundHated = FALSE;
00745       INT8                                                  bHated;
00746 
00747       bMercID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00748       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
00749 
00750       // loop through all mercs to calculate their morale
00751   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ bMercID ]; bMercID <= bLastTeamID; bMercID++,pSoldier++)
00752       {     
00753             //if the merc is active, in Arulco, and conscious, not POW
00754             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && 
00755                                                                                                 !(pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ||
00756                                                                                                 pSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE ||
00757                                                                                                 pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ||
00758                                                                                                 pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW) )
00759             {
00760                   // calculate the guy's opinion of the people he is with
00761                   pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ]);
00762 
00763                   // if we're moving
00764                   if (pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 && PlayerIDGroupInMotion( pSoldier->ubGroupID ))
00765                   {
00766                         // we only check our opinions of people in our squad
00767                         fSameGroupOnly = TRUE;
00768                   }
00769                   else
00770                   {
00771                         fSameGroupOnly = FALSE;
00772                   }
00773                   fFoundHated = FALSE;
00774 
00775                   // reset counts to calculate average opinion
00776                   iTotalOpinions = 0;
00777                   bNumTeamMembers = 0;
00778 
00779                   // let people with high leadership affect their own morale
00780                   bHighestTeamLeadership = EffectiveLeadership( pSoldier );
00781 
00782                   // loop through all other mercs
00783                   bOtherID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00784                   for ( pOtherSoldier = MercPtrs[ bOtherID ]; bOtherID <= bLastTeamID; bOtherID++,pOtherSoldier++)
00785                   {
00786                         // skip past ourselves and all inactive mercs
00787                         if (bOtherID != bMercID && pOtherSoldier->bActive && pOtherSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE &&
00788                                                                                                                                                                                     !(pOtherSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ||
00789                                                                                                                                                                                            pOtherSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE ||
00790                                                                                                                                                                                            pOtherSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ||
00791                                                                                                                                                                                            pOtherSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW))
00792                         {
00793                               if (fSameGroupOnly)
00794                               {
00795                                     // all we have to check is the group ID
00796                                     if (pSoldier->ubGroupID != pOtherSoldier->ubGroupID)
00797                                     {
00798                                           continue;
00799                                     }
00800                               }
00801                               else
00802                               {
00803                                     // check to see if the location is the same
00804                                     if (pOtherSoldier->sSectorX != pSoldier->sSectorX ||
00805                                             pOtherSoldier->sSectorY != pSoldier->sSectorY ||
00806                                                 pOtherSoldier->bSectorZ != pSoldier->bSectorZ)
00807                                     {
00808                                           continue;
00809                                     }
00810                                     
00811                                     // if the OTHER soldier is in motion then we don't do anything!
00812                                     if (pOtherSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 && PlayerIDGroupInMotion( pOtherSoldier->ubGroupID ))
00813                                     {
00814                                           continue;
00815                                     }
00816                               }
00817                               bOpinion = pProfile->bMercOpinion[ pOtherSoldier->ubProfile ];
00818                               if (bOpinion == HATED_OPINION)
00819                               {
00820 
00821                                     bHated = WhichHated( pSoldier->ubProfile, pOtherSoldier->ubProfile );
00822                                     if ( bHated >= 2 )
00823                                     {
00824                                           // learn to hate which has become full-blown hatred, full strength
00825                                           fFoundHated = TRUE;
00826                                           break;
00827                                     }
00828                                     else 
00829                                     {
00830                                           // scale according to how close to we are to snapping
00831                                           //KM : Divide by 0 error found.  Wrapped into an if statement.
00832                                           if( pProfile->bHatedTime[ bHated ] )
00833                                           {
00834                                                 bOpinion = ((INT32) bOpinion) * (pProfile->bHatedTime[ bHated ] - pProfile->bHatedCount[ bHated ]) / pProfile->bHatedTime[ bHated ];
00835                                           }
00836 
00837                                           if ( pProfile->bHatedCount[ bHated ] <= pProfile->bHatedTime[ bHated ] / 2 )
00838                                           {
00839                                                 // Augh, we're teamed with someone we hate!  We HATE this!!  Ignore everyone else!        
00840                                                 fFoundHated = TRUE;
00841                                                 break;
00842                                           }
00843                                           // otherwise just mix this opinion in with everyone else... 
00844                                     }
00845                               }
00846                               iTotalOpinions += bOpinion;
00847                               bNumTeamMembers++;
00848                               if ( EffectiveLeadership( pOtherSoldier ) > bHighestTeamLeadership)
00849                               {
00850                                     bHighestTeamLeadership = EffectiveLeadership( pOtherSoldier );
00851                               }
00852                         }
00853                   }
00854 
00855                   if (fFoundHated)
00856                   {
00857                         // If teamed with someone we hated, team opinion is automatically minimum
00858                         bActualTeamOpinion = HATED_OPINION;
00859                   }
00860                   else if (bNumTeamMembers > 0)
00861                   {
00862                         bActualTeamOpinion = (INT8) (iTotalOpinions / bNumTeamMembers);
00863                         // give bonus/penalty for highest leadership value on team
00864                         bActualTeamOpinion += (bHighestTeamLeadership - 50) / 10;
00865                   }
00866                   else // alone
00867                   {
00868                         bActualTeamOpinion = 0;
00869                   }
00870 
00871                   // reduce to a range of HATED through BUDDY
00872                   if (bActualTeamOpinion > BUDDY_OPINION)
00873                   {
00874                         bActualTeamOpinion = BUDDY_OPINION;
00875                   }
00876                   else if (bActualTeamOpinion < HATED_OPINION)
00877                   {
00878                         bActualTeamOpinion = HATED_OPINION;
00879                   }
00880 
00881                   // shift morale from team by ~10%
00882 
00883                   // this should range between -75 and +75
00884                   bTeamMoraleModDiff = bActualTeamOpinion - pSoldier->bTeamMoraleMod;
00885                   if (bTeamMoraleModDiff > 0)
00886                   {
00887                         bTeamMoraleModChange = 1 + bTeamMoraleModDiff / 10;
00888                   }
00889                   else if (bTeamMoraleModDiff < 0)
00890                   {
00891                         bTeamMoraleModChange = -1 + bTeamMoraleModDiff / 10;
00892                   }
00893                   else
00894                   {
00895                         bTeamMoraleModChange = 0;
00896                   }
00897                   pSoldier->bTeamMoraleMod += bTeamMoraleModChange;
00898                   pSoldier->bTeamMoraleMod = __min( pSoldier->bTeamMoraleMod, MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00899                   pSoldier->bTeamMoraleMod = __max( pSoldier->bTeamMoraleMod, -MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00900                   
00901                   // New, December 3rd, 1998, by CJC --
00902                   // If delayed strategic modifier exists then incorporate it in strategic mod
00903                   if ( pSoldier->bDelayedStrategicMoraleMod )
00904                   {
00905                         pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod += pSoldier->bDelayedStrategicMoraleMod;
00906                         pSoldier->bDelayedStrategicMoraleMod = 0;
00907                         pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod = __min( pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod, MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00908                         pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod = __max( pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod, -MORALE_MOD_MAX );
00909                   }
00910 
00911                   // refresh the morale value for the soldier based on the recalculated team modifier
00912                   RefreshSoldierMorale( pSoldier );
00913             }
00914       }
00915 
00916       bStrategicMoraleUpdateCounter++;
00917 
00918       if ( bStrategicMoraleUpdateCounter == HOURS_BETWEEN_STRATEGIC_DECAY )
00919       {
00920             DecayStrategicMoraleModifiers();
00921             bStrategicMoraleUpdateCounter = 0;
00922       }
00923 
00924 }
00925 
00926 
00927 void DailyMoraleUpdate(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00928 {
00929       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE )
00930       {
00931             return;
00932       }
00933 
00934       // CJC: made per hour now
00935 /*
00936       // decay the merc's strategic morale modifier
00937       if (pSoldier->bStrategicMoraleMod != 0)
00938       {
00939             // decay the modifier!
00940             DecayStrategicMorale( pSoldier );
00941 
00942             // refresh the morale value for the soldier based on the recalculated modifier
00943             RefreshSoldierMorale( pSoldier );
00944       }
00945 */
00946 
00947       // check death rate vs. merc's tolerance once/day (ignores buddies!)
00948       if ( MercThinksDeathRateTooHigh( pSoldier->ubProfile ) )
00949       {
00950             // too high, morale takes a hit
00951             HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_HIGH_DEATHRATE, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00952       }
00953 
00954       // check his morale vs. his morale tolerance once/day (ignores buddies!)
00955       if ( MercThinksHisMoraleIsTooLow( pSoldier ) )
00956       {
00957             // too low, morale sinks further (merc's in a funk and things aren't getting better)
00958             HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_POOR_MORALE, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00959       }
00960       else if ( pSoldier->bMorale >= 75 )
00961       {
00962             // very high morale, merc is cheerleading others
00963             HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_GREAT_MORALE, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00964       }
00965 
00966 }
